metadata.purpose: Consciousness, computation, and advanced topics in Conv(ℚ)
metadata.usage: Include in Information/Complexity essay with appropriate caveats
metadata.tone: Present carefully - these are theoretical frameworks, not claims about consciousness itself

consciousness.disclaimer: This shows how IIT can be formulated in Conv(ℚ), not a claim to have "solved" consciousness

formulation.integrated_info: Φ = min_{partition} I(partition) ∈ ℚ where I is mutual information over ℚ-distributions
formulation.computation: For discrete system with rational transition probabilities, Φ is computable in ℚ

consciousness.example: Simple 3-node network: - States: {000, 001, ..., 111} - Transitions: ℚ-valued probabilities - Φ computed via ℚ-matrix operations

model.strange_loop: Φ(state) contains model of Φ via ℚ-Gödel numbers
model.self_reference: System models itself through ℚ-encoding Fixed point: S = F(S) where F is ℚ-computable

consciousness.note: This is a computational model, not a claim about phenomenological consciousness

computation_theory.statement: Every effectively calculable function is ℚ-computable
computation_theory.strengthened: Physical Church-Turing: Nature computes in ℚ

computation_theory.theorem: P_ℚ = P, NP_ℚ = NP when allowing convergent sequences

encoding.goedel_numbering: Statements encoded as ℚ-numbers via π function ⌜φ⌝ = Gödel number of φ ∈ ℚ
encoding.self_reference: G ≡ ¬Prov(⌜G⌝) G = fixed point via ℚ-diagonalization

goedel.interpretation: Incompleteness = some ℚ-computations don't terminate Not a limitation but a feature preventing paradox

construction.simplicial: ∞-Cat = sSet = Fun(Δ^op, ℚ-Set) Δ[n] = {0 < 1 < ... < n} ⊂ ℚ

higher_types.circle: S¹ = ℚ/ℤ with π₁(S¹) = ℤ ⊂ ℚ

synthesis.unified_equation: Reality = lim_{n→∞} Conv(ℚ)_n where each stage is ℚ-computable
synthesis.philosophical_note: This is a mathematical framework, not metaphysical dogma. It shows ℚ suffices mathematically, not that reality "is" ℚ.
